meanings.definition: A person from the northern region of a country.
meanings.sent1: The norteno greeted us warmly with a smile.
meanings.sent2: Many nortenos enjoy the colder weather up north.
meanings.sent3: The norteno joked about how he could handle the snow better than us southerners.
meanings.sent4: His resilience in the face of harsh winters made him a true norteno.
meanings.sent5: The norteno's accent was a clear giveaway of his origins.

meanings.definition: A style of Mexican music originating in the northern regions of Mexico.
meanings.sent1: The lively norteno music had everyone dancing at the fiesta.
meanings.sent2: Norteno songs often feature accordion and bajo sexto.
meanings.sent3: We couldn't help but tap our feet to the catchy norteno beat.
meanings.sent4: The norteno melodies painted a vivid picture of the Mexican countryside.
meanings.sent5: Listening to norteno always brings back memories of family gatherings.
